name: Ritter Sport Marzipan Chocolate Bar
description: Marzipan is probably the best thing that can happen to an almond, Ritter Sport recognizes this fact by coating delicious marzipan in their rich dark chocolate.  Ritter blends almonds from around the world in their marzipan for a subtle sweetness and smooth richness like no other.  This is one of Ritter Sport’s oldest recipes, having been in production since 1935.Ingredients: sugar, cocoa mass, almonds (16 %), cocoa butter, invert sugar syrup, emulsifier (lecithins (soy)), humectant (invertase), natural flavouring.May contain traces of peanuts, other nuts, gluten, milk and egg.
